Arabic.Name: النصر
Lines: وَرَأَيۡتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدۡخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفۡوَاجٗا
فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابَۢا

English.Name: An-Nasr
Lines: When the victory of Allah has come and the conquest
And you see the people entering into the religion of Allah in multitudes
Then exalt [Him] with praise of your Lord and ask forgiveness of Him. Indeed, He is ever Accepting of repentance

Turkish.Name: NASR
Lines: İyiliği sonsuz, ikramı bol Allah’ın adıyla,
insanların bölük bölük Allah’ın dinine girdiklerini görürsen
